main.name: Iván González
main.bio: Good team worker. Eager to have new work experiences where I can have the opportunity to learn more in the technological field, grow personally and professionally, and thus be able to contribute positively to the achievement of the objectives.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
